entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the one who shouted 'SILENCE!' and forced silence upon everyone. He also spoke to Hagrid, telling him to set Harry down at his feet.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the one who was told by Voldemort to set Harry down at his feet.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the person who was being lowered onto the grass and was spoken about by Voldemort.

relationships.description: Voldemort ordered Hagrid to set Harry down at his feet.
Voldemort dominated over Harry Potter, as he was the one who was being spoken about and treated by Voldemort.
